issue.title: fix: workaround Bazel lcov parsing bug

repository.name: rules_py
repository.description: More compatible Bazel rules for running Python tools and building Python projects

issue.body:
https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/25118 was causing our coverage reports to fail to parse into combined report.

Related to #520 which was missing testing that the report actually worked.
fyi @dizzy57

issue.title: Support `FN` lines with end of function line number

labels.name: team-Core
labels.description: Skyframe, bazel query, BEP, options parsing, bazelrc

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system

issue.title: Update to use coverage_output_generator-v2.8

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system

issue.body:
Built at commit ee12906c

Relevant changes:

 * Add support for input FN lines that include a function end line (#25118).

RELNOTES:
    LCOV parsing does not break on FN lines including an end line number.
